name: REWINDER (ahmed349)
description:
A game made in 2 weeks for My First Game Jam jam.

A little platformer where you have the ability to rewind time of physic objects.

The game currently has only 6 levels which can be completed in 10-15 minutes.

Glitch visual effect from KinoGlitch.

Old Analog TV Noise and Static Sound effects pack - Created by Michael Freudenberg - Freudenberg Films | Website: freudenbergfilms.com

Music: Memories of Better Times by gurdonark (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/gurdonark/61313 Ft: Essesq

Special thanks to everyone who helped me on the My First Game Jam discord.
